name: 4x3, LLC
description: 4x3 is a graphic design studio and web development firm located in suburban Philadelphia that provides creative solutions for corporations, small businesses and non-profit organizations. Our services include logo design, branding, website design and development, responsive design, SEO, content management, database construction, website hosting, and social media and event marketing. 4x3 also partners with creative firms to provide expert consulting and development on interactive projects.
